titles.title: FCHIP Extension Act
FCHIP Extension Act
Frontier Community Health Integration Project Extension Act
A bill to extend the Frontier Community Health Integration Project Demonstration.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Frontier Community Health Integration Project Extension Act or the FCHIP Extension Act
This bill reauthorizes the Frontier Community Health Integration Project (FCHIP) through August 1, 2024. (FCHIP is a demonstration project that aims to improve access to, and integration of, acute care, extended care, and other health services for Medicare beneficiaries in rural areas.)
